room_title: Escape room "The Investigation" by Beast Escape Room in Glen Carbon
review: My family and I had a blast!! Everything was so organized and Kyle was so helpful! Great place to bring your family and friends!

room_title: Escape room "The Investigation" by Beast Escape Room in Glen Carbon
review: We took our youth group here for our first outing of the year, and it was great! The operator, Kyle, did a great job of explaining the rules to us and we had a great time! We would definitely do this again!

room_title: Escape room "The Investigation" by Beast Escape Room in Glen Carbon
review: Owner was really helpful, the group had lots of fun!
